channel.title: Need help making shops (NR3 V4)
channel.description: I need someones help, i want to make really good shops for my nr3, and they should have all the best shit, but im not good at that kind of stuff so if someone can help me put together some good shops, Add me on skype, pm me, or reply to this post. Thanks.

item.title: Need help making shops (NR3 V4)
item.dc:creator: @T_h_3 T h 3
item.description:
@T_h_3 wrote:

nardoscape:

No, i know how to do it, its just that i want someone to make me preset shops.

You should try checking out some other servers and come up with something. If your having enough trouble just coming up with a few shops that you need to ask someone for help, then you really need to re-evaluate your gameplan.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help making shops (NR3 V4)
item.dc:creator: @noah1gamble noah1gamble
item.description:
@noah1gamble wrote:

nardoscape:

Making shops is very straightforward, why don’t you look up a tutorial on here using the search button? or use Google?

No, i know how to do it, its just that i want someone to make me preset shops.

Read full topic
